definitions.definition: Any of several forms of particle accelerator in which two opposing beams of particles collide .
A node in a causal graph that has at least two incoming edges .
A model of the shape of an object for purposes of collision detection .

main_definition: ( physics ) Any of several forms of particle accelerator in which two opposing beams of particles collide .
secondary_definitions: ( graph theory ) A node in a causal graph that has at least two incoming edges .
( video games ) A model of the shape of an object for purposes of collision detection .
